author: costin
msg: Refactoring to avoid method duplications. Added helper methods to find
info about a method and attribute.

author: costin
msg: The service task is a grouping of mbeans. It'll be possible to perform different
operations on the whole group. Right now it just executes the default ( init/start).
This simplifies a lot the syntax of ant files that control services like tomcat.

author: costin
msg: A bit of refactoring and improvements in the ant tasks, to simplify the
syntax and take advantage of metadata.
The type is no longer needed ( since we have it anyway ). Duplicated code
removed. <mbean> can take a "modeler" boolean flag that will add support
for arbitrary beans ( it was a separate tag before ).

author: costin
msg: Use the new methods to execute init/start on all mbeans in the file.
That makes the behavior very similar with other tools.
